name: Insect Mania Reloaded
description:
Insect Mania Reloaded is a Roguelike Bloody First Person Action Shooter with cutting edge visuals and fast paced action in which the player is placed in a jungle full of spiders, snails, scorpions, centipedes,  gigantic insect-bosses. as well as land and flying bugs that you need to defeat. 

This is a remastered version of the original that adds new content and features but removes somes that were considered useless like water!

The game also features cool VFX's and flying pets! 

Have fun!

- Changes in relation to the original:

> The remaster is more difficult than the original game;

> Added 3 New Enemy Types;

> Added 3 New Bosses;

> New Main & Pause Menus;

> New Envirnommetal Effects, Colors and Lighting;

> Xbox Controller Support;

> Better Optimized than the Original;

For Bug Reports, e-mail: insectmaniareloaded@gmail.com

For Chat, we have Discord: https://discord.gg/tzQHTq8N

Site of the game: https://ograndiosolil.wixsite.com/insectmaniareloaded
